description: ServerStatus describes the current status of a specific WebLogic server.

startTime.description: RFC 3339 date and time at which the server started.

clusterName.description: WebLogic cluster name, if the server is part of a cluster

nodeName.description: Name of node that is hosting the Pod containing this WebLogic server.

state.description: Current state of this WebLogic server.

health.description: Server health of this WebLogic server.

subsystemName.description: Name of subsystem providing symptom information.

symptoms.description: Symptoms provided by the reporting subsystem.
